description: A modern baby carrier with soft paddings and a small built-in blanket. It comes with a sturdy over-arching handle and a breathable shutter to shield a baby from the outside elements like the sun and wind.

A more primitive baby carrier, it is merely a wicker basket with an over-arching handle and enough straw to pad a baby on top of the cloth that lays upon the straw. The cloth is large enough to fold double over the straw, and can cover a baby and pad the straw if need be.
